item.title: Week 9 The Contexts of Archaeology
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back This week represents a kind of pivot point in the course. So far, we’ve largely been focused on the moment when observations in the field become data, and then on the kinds of manipulations of those data we might do. This week, we’re going to zoom out a bit and consider how we get from that level of detail to larger scale macroscopic stories about the past.
